querystring.select: SELECT VAT.ASSET_TYPE_NAME AS CollType, AC.COLLATERAL_VALUE_AMT AS CollPrice, CCRM.DESCR AS CollCondition, CURM.DESCR AS CollUsage, AC.ASSET_TAX_DT AS CollTaxDt, AC.FULL_ASSET_NAME AS CollName, AC.MANUFACTURING_YEAR AS MnfctringYear, AC.SERIAL_NO_1 AS SerialNo1, AC.SERIAL_NO_2 AS SerialNo2, AC.SERIAL_NO_3 AS SerialNo3, AC.COLLATERAL_PORTION_PRCNT AS CollPrcnt, AC.COLLATERAL_NOTES AS CollNotes
querystring.from: FROM DBO.APP_COLLATERAL AC WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN DBO.V_ASSET_TYPE VAT WITH(NOLOCK) ON AC.ASSET_TYPE_CODE = VAT.ASSET_TYPE_CODE LEFT JOIN DBO.V_REF_MASTER CCRM WITH(NOLOCK) ON AC.MR_COLLATERAL_CONDITION_CODE = CCRM.MASTER_CODE AND CCRM.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'ASSET_CONDITION' LEFT JOIN DBO.V_REF_MASTER CURM WITH(NOLOCK) ON AC.MR_COLLATERAL_USAGE_CODE = CURM.MASTER_CODE AND CURM.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'ASSET_USAGE'
